body_html:
Probably, I found the root cause of the error.
In my cluster, each node is connected with IB and ethernet.
When the program is passed ethernet IP addr as host addresses, the connection is failed as this issue.
(Despite the IB connection is linked up.)
When the program is passed IPoIB addr, the error is disappeared!
However, I wonder why the error is caused when not using IPoIB.

If my hypothesis is true, I suggest grpc+gdr mode (and grpc+verbs mode?) to display some warning when the initial connection does not use IPoIB.
